name: Anita Francesca Marina Visit
description: Anita Francesca Marina works as a CNA, and is identified as a high-priority candidate for a new adult vaccine.  She makes an appointment for the vaccination clinic where she will receive the vaccination.  The provider identifies the list of patients that will be vaccinated the following day and requests the patient history from the registry. Anita is one of these patients. Her immunization history is retrieved from the registry and reconciled with the local information in the medical record to determine vaccines that are due. Vaccinations are ordered and administered. The vaccines are reported to the immunization registry and a vaccine summary is available for the patient.
